headline.print_headline: Meg Whitman, Chief of H.P., to Serve as Its Chairwoman, Too
headline.main: Now It's Really Meg Whitman's H.P.

docs.snippet: Meg Whitman, the chief executive of Hewlett-Packard, was named chairwoman of its board Thursday, illustrating the company’s transformation to a place of professional managers....
docs.abstract: Meg Whitman, the chief executive of Hewlett-Packard, was named chairwoman of its board Thursday, illustrating the company’s transformation to a place of professional managers.

headline.print_headline: Car Submerged in New Jersey Park Lake; Driver Dead
headline.main: Car Submerged in New Jersey Park Lake; Driver Dead

docs.snippet: A dump truck rammed into a car at a traffic light on Thursday, sending them both into a nearby lake, submerging the car and killing its driver, police said. The dump truck's driver was injured....
docs.lead_paragraph: A dump truck rammed into a car at a traffic light on Thursday, sending them both into a nearby lake, submerging the car and killing its driver, police said. The dump truck's driver was injured.

headline.print_headline: Obama Nominates Fundraiser to Finland Envoy Post
headline.main: Obama Nominates Fundraiser to Finland Envoy Post

docs.snippet: President Barack Obama has nominated a lawyer who raised campaign money for him in the 2008 and 2012 elections as ambassador to Finland....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Barack Obama has nominated a lawyer who raised campaign money for him in the 2008 and 2012 elections as ambassador to Finland.

headline.print_headline: Timeline of the California Bank Robbery and Chase
headline.main: Timeline of the California Bank Robbery and Chase

docs.snippet: At 2:11 p.m. on Wednesday, police in the California city of Stockton received a report of a bank robbery in progress, police said. What follows is a summary by police of the subsequent hour-long chase and furious gunbattle that ended in the deaths...
docs.lead_paragraph: At 2:11 p.m. on Wednesday, police in the California city of Stockton received a report of a bank robbery in progress, police said. What follows is a summary by police of the subsequent hour-long chase and furious gunbattle that ended in the deaths of two suspects and a hostage.

headline.print_headline: Vinci, Nara, Pliskova Make Istanbul Quarters
headline.main: Vinci, Nara, Pliskova Make Istanbul Quarters

docs.snippet: Second-seeded Roberta Vinci of Italy advanced to the Istanbul Cup quarterfinals when Romanian qualifier Alexandra Dulgheru retired with a right shoulder injury while trailing 6-3, 4-1 on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Second-seeded Roberta Vinci of Italy advanced to the Istanbul Cup quarterfinals when Romanian qualifier Alexandra Dulgheru retired with a right shoulder injury while trailing 6-3, 4-1 on Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Puerto Rico Power Company's Finances Spark Concern
headline.main: Puerto Rico Power Company's Finances Spark Concern

docs.snippet: U.S. investors on Thursday pressed Puerto Rico government officials about the financial health of the island's power company amid fears it might soon seek to restructure millions of dollars in debt....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. investors on Thursday pressed Puerto Rico government officials about the financial health of the island's power company amid fears it might soon seek to restructure millions of dollars in debt.

docs.snippet: Arsenal have signed France right back Mathieu Debuchy from Newcastle United for an undisclosed fee, the London club said on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Arsenal have signed France right back Mathieu Debuchy from Newcastle United for an undisclosed fee, the London club said on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Microsoft plans to let go of up to 18,000 employees, mostly tied to its acquistion of Nokia's mobile handset unit, as the tech giant tries to adapt quicker to changing tastes in the tech world. Lily Jamali reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Microsoft plans to let go of up to 18,000 employees, mostly tied to its acquistion of Nokia's mobile handset unit, as the tech giant tries to adapt quicker to changing tastes in the tech world. Lily Jamali reports.
